notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Mokanda na yo ekobombama na mikolo 7 mpo na
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Mokanda na yo nyonso na communauté oyo ekobombama mpe ekotindikama na mikolo 7, nsima na yango okozala na makoki te ya kolongola to kobongola yango. Tala mokanda na yo na nse.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Mokanda na yo nyonso na groupe oyo ekobombama mpe ekotindikama na mikolo 7, nsima na yango okozala na makoki te ya kolongola to kobongola yango. Tala mokanda na yo na nse.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Kɔtá na lien ya communauté na nse, kɔtá lokola admin mpe pɛngwá Fraud management na menu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Motángo ya mikakatano ya kokoka kozala na bokosi na motango ya 75% ya bokosi
email.possibleFraudInformation: Système automatique na biso ebandi komona mikakatano ya kokoka kozala na bokosi. Okoki kotala malamumalamu na interface ya admin ya Communauté. Mikakatano mosusu ekoki kozala na mabɔkɔ ya malamu yango wana tala malamu liboso ya kolongola mokanda.
email.possibleFraudHeader: Mikakatano ya kokoka kozala na bokosi
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Mokanda oyo ebengisami automatiquement lokola toxique na nzela ya algorithmes ya AI oyo etángi toxicité ya mokanda. Okoki kolongola mokanda soki esengeli.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Algorithm ya AI automatiquement ebengisi bililingi oyo ezali na mokanda oyo. Algorithme oyo etángi bililingi mpo na kotala soki ezali na bililingi ya mibali to basi ya mibange, bililingi ya mobulu, bililingi ya bokono, mpe bililingi ya mposo. Okoki kolongola mokanda soki esengeli.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Mingi soki algorithme ya AI ebali score moko ya mabe, na likambo yango osengeli kobanga te, esengeli ozwa lisusu etamboli moko te mpe okoki kozanga koyanola na email oyo.
email.automaticToxicityEnglishText: Mokanda ya Anglais esalemi mpo na score
email.newPointedAddedToThisIdea: Point moko ya sika ebakisi na likanisi oyo
email.newPointedAddedToIdea: Point moko ya sika ebakisi na likanisi na yo
email.writtenByUser: Ekomi na mobali to mwasi na nkombo
email.postReport: Likanisi etiami na likambo mpo na kobuka mibeko
email.pointReport: Ntembe etiami na likambo mpo na kobuka mibeko
email.user_invite_2: Pɛsa kɔti na likanisi to mɛkɛ yango na adɛrɛsi ya nzɛlɛ ya moteyi mpo na koyokana na kotinda
email.pointNewSelf: Nzela ya sika na makanisi na yo
email.pointUnhelpfulSelf: Nzela ebimisami lokola ezangi tina na makanisi na ngai
email.pointHelpfulSelf: Nzela ebimisami lokola ezali na tina na makanisi na ngai
email.pointHelpful: Nzela ebimisami lokola ezali na tina
email.reset_password_1: Talá kuna mpo na kobongola sánzá na yo.
email.reset_password_2: Soki yo olobi te na likambo oyo, tala mpamba email oyo te.
email.reset_password_3: Mbongo na yo ekobongwana te kino okotisi lien oyo mpe osali mot de passe ya sika.
